name: Cat Herder (itch)
description:
Cat Herder was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare #40. The theme was 'The more you have the worse it is'. Everything was created by me except for the fonts, sfx, and music which weren't added to the game until the jam had already ended. These assets are taken from dafont.com, freesound.org, and incompetech.com respectively.

Music
Hidden Agenda Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
